trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration for a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: Define a configuração para um serviço de token de segurança (STS).

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement STSs derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam STSs derivam a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente carrega as definições da configuração atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para carregar as definições no ficheiro de configuração; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe que tem o nome de emissor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: Se `issuerName` é `null`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe que tem o nome de emissor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente carrega as definições da configuração atual.

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: Se `issuerName` é `null`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para carregar as definições no ficheiro de configuração; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe que possui o nome de emissor especificado e as credenciais de início de sessão.

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: Se `issuerName` é `null`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de assinatura para o STS.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe que possui o nome de emissor especificado e as credenciais de início de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente carrega as definições da configuração atual.

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: Se `issuerName` é `null`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de assinatura para o STS.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para carregar as definições no ficheiro de configuração; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> classe que possui o nome de emissor especificado e as credenciais de início de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Settings are loaded from the specified named configuration.
trans-unit.target: As definições são carregadas a partir da configuração com nome especificada.

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: Se `issuerName` é `null`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>propriedade deve ser definida antes do serviço de token de segurança é utilizado para criar um token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de assinatura para o STS.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from which the configuration is to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> elemento a partir do qual é possível carregar a configuração.

trans-unit.source: Creates an security token service (STS) instance from the <xref:System.Type> specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> property.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de serviço de tokens (STS) de segurança do <xref:System.Type>especificado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The class specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A> property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: A classe especificada na <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A>propriedade tem de implementar um construtor que assume um parâmetro do tipo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type> specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Type>especificado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default key size limit in bits used check if the KeySize specified in the request is within this limit.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite predefinido do tamanho da chave em bits utilizadas verificação se o KeySize especificado no pedido pertence a este limite.

trans-unit.source: This only applies to the symmetric key case.
trans-unit.target: Isto aplica-se apenas para o caso de chave simétrico.

trans-unit.source: The default key size limit, in bits.
trans-unit.target: O limite predefinido do tamanho da chave, em bits.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1024.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1024.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default key size in bits used in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho predefinido da chave em bits utilizados o token emitido.

trans-unit.source: This only applies to the symmetric key case.
trans-unit.target: Isto aplica-se apenas para o caso de chave simétrico.

trans-unit.source: The key size used in the issued token, in bits.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave utilizado no token emitido, em bits.

trans-unit.source: The default is 256.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 256.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default lifetime used in the issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a duração predefinida utilizada nos tokens emitidos.

trans-unit.source: The default lifetime to use in issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição de duração para utilizar em tokens emitidos.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 day.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de 1 dia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default token type that is used in token issuance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de token predefinido que é utilizado na emissão de tokens.

trans-unit.source: The string values are specified in URI format; for example, for the SAML 1.1 token type, the following is the string value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de cadeia são especificados no formato de URI Por exemplo, para o tipo de token SAML 1.1, segue-se o valor de cadeia: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1.

trans-unit.source: The default token type is set to SAML 1.1.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de token de predefinição está definido como SAML 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the default token type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que contém o tipo de token de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou estar vazio.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not defined in the token handlers.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não está definido nos processadores de token.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether WSDL generation should be enabled for the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se a geração de WSDL deve ser ativada para o serviço de token de segurança (STS).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable WSDL generation for the STS; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para ativar a geração de WSDL para o STS; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a duração máxima de token para tokens emitidos.

trans-unit.source: The maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: A duração máxima de token para tokens emitidos.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 day.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de 1 dia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Type>do serviço de token de segurança (STS).</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The class specified in the SecurityTokenService property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: A classe especificada na propriedade SecurityTokenService tem de implementar um construtor que assume um parâmetro do tipo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The type of the security token service.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço de tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The type must derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O tipo tem de derivar do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not assignable as <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é atribuível como <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as credenciais de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the issuer name so that it can be set in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do emissor, de modo a que pode ser definido no token emitido.

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do emissor.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string occurs.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa para definir a propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust 1.3 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o serializador de pedido de 1.3 WS-Trust (RST).

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust 1.3 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: O serializador de pedido de 1.3 WS-Trust (RST).

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust 1.3 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o serializador de WS-Trust 1.3 resposta (RSTR).

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust 1.3 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: O serializador de WS-Trust 1.3 resposta (RSTR).

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust Feb 2005 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o WS-Trust Fev de 2005 serializador de pedido (RST).

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Feb 2005 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: O WS-Trust Fev de 2005 serializador de pedido (RST).

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust Feb 2005 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o WS-Trust Fev de 2005 serializador de resposta (RSTR).

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Feb 2005 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: O WS-Trust Fev de 2005 serializador de resposta (RSTR).

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
